website_summaries.verdict: This book utilizes the most impressive moments from the ongoing Star Wars comics, and whether you color Jabba the Hutt with movie-accurate or rainbow colors, its excellent design makes sharing your art a breeze.
pros: 59 designs pulled from Marvel’s Star Wars comic book series
One illustration per page to prevent bleed-through
Classic characters like Chewbacca, Darth Vader, and C-3PO
cons: These comic covers and panels are amazing, but some feature extra-large sections of inked-out black areas

customer_reviews.title: Not much left to color
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of adult coloring books and of Star Wars. The issue with this one is that there really isn't much to color. Imagine a picture of Darth Vadar ("helpfully" already printed in full black) and a lot of storm troopers (white). There were a few buttons you could color, but that was about it. This happens a lot in this book. I get it - some of it is just that parts of Star Wars are starkly black and white. It's just a pet peeve of mine to have all the black already colored in for me. Not the end of the world. Just wish I hasn't spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Cannedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift idea for an older child!
customer_reviews.text: My eleven year old son really likes this coloring book. The pictures do have a lot of black space which can't be colored so this definitely falls more into the adult coloring/shading realm but it's a great book with many awesome Marvel Comic inspired Star Wars scenes.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Brought this for my brother
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my brother hoping that it would help him take breaks from his video games since he is obsessed with them. So far it has not captured his interest even though he is an avid is Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: all our stories

customer_reviews.title: Very much used and already colored in
customer_reviews.text: While the art is fantastic, my book came with pages that were already colored-in and pages that were torn out. This was super disappointing as it was supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bippity Boppity

customer_reviews.title: Needs a Revamp
customer_reviews.text: Love the pictures, but too much of it is blacked out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: I bet they would have loved it if I had a chance to give it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift! I bet they would have loved it if I had a chance to give it. I think I’ll just keep it
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the pictures, but.. the paper is really thin, and too much black sigh I am just looking for a decent Star Wars coloring book that is not all blacked out .
customer_reviews.author: W. Bloink

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fun pix! 9 year old loved this. So did his dad.
customer_reviews.author: tbj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great b/w line art straight from the newer Marvel comics.
customer_reviews.author: Machete

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Coloring Book!
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of fun scenes to color. My daughter and I both enjoyed coloring in the pages, and making the scenes our own. I'm happy with my purchase, and the results.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R.Top Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Fun Star Wars Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter said this about the book. "The pictures are very detailed. It is fun to color in and I spend a lot of time working on it. Some of the pictures don't make sense, but they are funny! For example, Han Solo, and Luke Skywalker flying in the Millenium Falcon with a bunch of yaks! Just to name one of the funny pictures."
customer_reviews.author: jerichomarch

customer_reviews.title: Great images. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: now THIS IS the Star Wars coloring book I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Color!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas Gift for my son. He loved it and colors in it often. Delivered in great condition and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good way to color many different Star Wars characters!
customer_reviews.text: Fun book with many different characters from classic Star Wars and a few from the prequel trilogy & The Force Awakens. Pics are on one side of the paper. Paper quality is fine but not the heaviest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G
